name: Aether Energy
headline: Solar and roofing workflow software for solar installers worldwide
description:
Aether is an AI-powered end-to-end platform for rooftop solar and roofing installers in the US and Western European markets. 

Some of our innovations:

- In-house computer vision and fine-tuned AI models built for solar
- Rapid and accurate photovoltaic site design, 10x faster
- Co-pilot for rooftop solar to streamline & automate various tasks for solar installers. 

Why it’s needed: Today, rooftop solar is still complex, expensive, and inaccurate. More than half of the cost of a rooftop solar project comes from soft costs. We started Aether with the sole aim of reducing solar soft costs. 

Our vision: Aether will be a big player in the young and emerging Solar software vertical, which has a projected 20B Global TAM up for grabs by 2025.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:saas; industry:solar-power; industry:climate; industry:renewable-energy; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Zayne Sagar, Founder
founders.description:
Zayne is the co-founder and CEO of Aether Energy. 

He has an academic background from UC Berkeley. Professionally, he has had brief stints at Spire Global, Aurora Solar and BetterEarth. Three climate-driven companies, working on problems around space-based weather data, and energy modeling at the intersection of software. Zayne has helped build high-performing product & engineering teams from the ground up by the age of 28.

founders.name: Shelby Bons, Founder
founders.description:
Shelby is the co-founder and CTO of Aether Energy.

She has expertise in software engineering and ML Physical Systems modeling, developed at leading climate-centric organizations like Sunrun and Voltaiq. Before that, she completed a Materials Science and Engineering degree at the University of California, Berkeley. 

Prior to founding Aether, Shelby was headed for a Theoretical Physics PhD career track.

![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/K1Mvt5ArZvpj5TKu95NBwhQuhNg.png)
# Power your Resi Solar business the way you want it. 
Aether is built to run residential solar workflows end to end or can be a plug and play solution with other existing apps. 
  * Automated one click residential solar designs at scale.


  * Aether shading engine is built from the ground up to solve accuracy gaps on production estimates. 


  * Streamlined deal management via a simple CRM. 


  * Aether works out of the box for 300M buildings across the US, UK, Germany, and France.

# Check what AI Built 
# Check what AI Built 
Our AI works quickly to create detailed solar designs. In just moments, you'll have a plan to review. 
For many regions, the AI automatically handles panel placement, fire setbacks, and electrical wiring layouts. 
Design your entire solar installation remotely, without the need for initial site visits.

# Aether for Building Installers
A reason Aether was built is because we hated building integrations for solar companies and having to connect multiple different apps with different data structures. 
The aim of Aether is to simplify with a single powerful super app for solar and roofing installers.

generated_description:
**Aether Energy Overview**

**Company Name:** Aether Energy  
**Founded:** 2023  
**Location:** San Francisco, CA  
**Team Size:** 4 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** W24  
**Website:** [aethernrg.com](https://www.aethernrg.com)  

**Mission:** Aether Energy is on a mission to revolutionize the solar and roofing industries through innovative workflow software designed specifically for solar installers around the globe.

### What They Do
Initially launching as an AI-powered platform focused on rooftop solar and roofing installations in the U.S. and Western Europe, Aether Energy simplifies the entire workflow from design to payment. The company aims to tackle the complexity and high costs associated with installing rooftop solar systems, which often include significant soft costs—commonly over half the project expenses.

### Key Innovations
1. **In-House AI & Computer Vision:** Aether has developed proprietary AI models and computer vision technology tailored for the solar industry.
2. **Fast Design Capabilities:** The platform offers rapid, high-accuracy photovoltaic site designs—potentially speeding up processes by 10x.
3. **Co-Pilot Feature:** Aether provides an automated co-pilot functionality to streamline various installation tasks, making it easier for solar installers to manage projects efficiently.

### Market Vision
Aether Envisions becoming a major player in the emerging solar software market, which is projected to be worth $20 billion globally by 2025. The software is engineered to serve both residential and commercial solar workflows seamlessly. It's designed to be compatible with an impressive 300 million buildings across the U.S., U.K., Germany, and France.

### Value Proposition
The goal is clear: to reduce the often-overlooked soft costs associated with solar projects. By offering an all-in-one software solution that simplifies project management, Aether aims to empower solar installers to deliver higher quality work at lower costs. 

### Backers and Tags
Aether Energy is supported by notable industry leaders and is tagged as focusing on:
- Artificial Intelligence
- SaaS (Software as a Service)
- Solar Power
- Climate and Renewable Energy
- Based in the San Francisco Bay Area

### Why It Matters
In a landscape grappling with the complexities and costs of renewable energy initiatives, Aether Energy operates on the belief that streamlining workflows will not just benefit installers but ultimately promote broader adoption of renewable solutions. They’re on a pathway to redefine how solar projects are executed, making sustainable energy more accessible and affordable.

In short, Aether Energy stands at the intersection of AI and renewable energy, making it a compelling player in both the tech and solar fields.
